lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I have a little extra to spare and don't need to buy an extra pair of shoes!! Plus I know it will go much further and make a bigger difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the vulnerable.  The people who have the least and need the most help.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: I love supporting local businesses and contributing to economies that support the residents in a community. Even at home in the States, I prefer shopping at independently owned stores and eating in family-owned restaurants. It's a great way to live!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently unemployed. I had been working in advertising, but the economy forced my company to lay me off. I am looking for a new job. Wish me luck!

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: Even though I am far from wealthy, I am truely blessed in too many ways to number. God desires that we be good stewards of His blessings and as such it is my desire to share these blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, but have chosen to work at Boys & Girls Town. This is an organization that provides homes and treatment to troubled youths.

lenders.name: Lisa & Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I have such blessings in my life, my daughter from India, my friends and my career.  I really wanted to help a woman in the world find her own hope and joy.  I wanted to share this with my best friend so that she can have all the happiness giving gives to us.
lenders.occupational_info: Work on large technology projects in a corporate setting.

lenders.name: M family
lenders.loan_because: We like the feeling of being able to empower someone else to achieve their dream.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that financial growth leads to personal and political freedoms more surely than any other readily available means.  I believe that entrepreneurship is vital to improving and sustaining local, then national, economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney.

lenders.name: Schevus
lenders.loan_because: I am always trying to help make the world a better place. I try to help out whoever I can, whether it be friends, the homeless, or even the less fortunate overseas.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop web based applications using the Java programming language.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.occupation: Small business owner & grandmother and mother

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I too am a small business owner and want to help others create a sustainable living.

lenders.name: Karishma
lenders.loan_because: Because I love the idea of knowing where my money is going, and how its' helping assist someone...

lenders.name: Cortney
lenders.loan_because: I care.  Plus entrepreneurship rocks!
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure the numbers are correct.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: My travels in the developing world have shown me first-hand how microloans can truly empower individuals to improve their lives and communities.  I love that Kiva is bringing that awareness to a wider audience and providing opportunities for people to get involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Certified Life and Career Coach with a passion for Career Breaks, Life Sabbaticals and Long-term Travel.  I love working with clients who dream of traveling, living, working, studying or volunteering abroad and my specialty is empowering people to escape their cubicles so they can strike out and discover the world on their own terms!

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling of helping others- even if it's by writing a check.  I am inspired by their stories.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel across the East Coast of the United States by plane and by car.  I sell services to Insurance Companies.

lenders.name: Luiz Felipe NF.
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that by helping other to help themselves we are making our contribution for a Better World. Plus, I do think that daily actions counts and it doesn’t matter how small it is! So, if you are a believer just like us, join Kiva and sponsor someone’s dream.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: the opportunity for prosperity should be available to all of humanity.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: i am blessed to live in a place of abundance, and I want to help others less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I research market trends and regulatory developments around the world in the energy market.  My company produces meters that measure eletrical power, and software that permits multiple meters to feed their information to a central server.  Our technology enables large consumers of electricity to better manage their power usage, reduce waste, reduce costs, and increase efficiency and operational uptime.  This saves money and reduces greenhouse gas emissions.

lenders.name: Jenia
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: Nancy & Ron
lenders.loan_because:
We can't all do great things, but we can do small things with great love.
Quote by Mother Teresa

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: I have visited some beautiful countries with such friendly and enterprising people that just need a chance to make a go of it.
lenders.occupational_info: We bake fresh rum cakes, package them, and sell them to consumers and stores.

lenders.name: Reynolds High School
lenders.loan_because: We know it's important to reach beyond the walls of the classroom into the community!

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I want to spread the wealth!!
lenders.occupational_info: I brew craft beer for the community around me!

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.occupation: writer, editor, appraiser, lawyer, shop owner

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: ... we're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work in television as an entertainment producer for a morning show in NYC but I left to follow my lifelong dream - to be a foster parent to children in need. My partner and I had 2 placements before adopting our awesome little man Ethan! I am now a freelance news writer/producer.

lenders.name: colleen
lenders.loan_because: i received a gift certificate for Kiva, for my birthday, from my neighbors!   they know me well... they knew that this was the perfect gift for me, to be able to gift to another!
lenders.occupational_info:
i work in a school for emotionally and mentally disturbed children, ages three through eleven.
i specifically work with the children when they are having difficulty behaving.  i help them have the best school experience they can, despite their limitations.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: Sarnia Collegiate
lenders.loan_because: we want to help developing countries establish a better economy. It only costs a few dollars each to help someone 4000 miles away.

lenders.name: Deborah & Gary
lenders.loan_because: Because we are all in this world together!

lenders.name: Reynolds High School
lenders.loan_because: We know it's important to help others! Our one dollar each can make a difference!!
lenders.occupational_info: We're one of five classes that's decided to do what we can to help others in need!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: Kakbank
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who get together each month to lend money and eat cookies!

lenders.name: Reynolds High School
lenders.loan_because: We use Spanish in class every day and want to support others outside the classroom
lenders.occupational_info: We're in 9th-12th grades and know the importance of an education to succeed. We want to help this family succeed as well!

lenders.name: Reynolds High School
lenders.loan_because: We're learning Spanish. We want to help those who are Spanish speaking be successful in their efforts
lenders.occupational_info: 9th-12th grade Spanish II students

lenders.name: Reynolds High School
lenders.loan_because: We learn Spanish and about different cultures and want to support those cultures
lenders.occupational_info: 9th-12th grade students who want to be successful and help others be successful.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: Kiva has developed a more efficient and effective way to donate to those in need in developing nations.  I believe that it's often better to improve the world with a bottom-up rather than a top-down approach.  I also greatly appreciate the fact that I'm not just donating money to people to meet their immediate daily needs of food, clothing, shelter, medicine, etc. that they require just to get by; instead, I'm helping them develop a means of personal and economic development that will sustain their well-being for the long-term.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an ice hockey referee, a math and english tutor, and an aspiring high school history teacher.

lenders.name: Pedro J
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva me ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos a quienes resulta realmente difícil acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los microcréditos, pueden desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida. Toda persona merece una oportunidad y esta es una de las formas más eficaces y dignas de ayudarle.     

Thanks to Kiva it is possible to support people in need giving them a chance to create a sustainable business. I really believe microcredit loan is a strong tool to help people around the world to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Beau
lenders.loan_because: I am a strong believer in Pay It Forward.  I have been given MUCH in life and it feels good to be able to give back to someone else.  I had a friend who helped me start a business.  Now I can do the same for someone else!  I am excited about this project.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of meteorology.  I learn about weather!  I work with local emergency management to make my community safer during severe weather outbreaks.  I also volunteer some of my time for the American Red Cross.  I run my own business which invests in real estate.

lenders.name: Marisol & Alberto
lenders.loan_because: I care! My family came from a poor upbringing in Mexico and I have been lucky enough to have become successfull. I know first hand how hard it is to start a business and  borrow money, my father succesfully started his business in his home country of Mexico (I remember putting stone to mortar on one of the buildings as a little kid!). My main focus is Mexico since that is where my family is from. My husband Alberto is an economist and we have had discussions on helping folks with a hand-up (via a micro-loan) rather than a hand out. So to all of you that are in a positon to help I say, share your success with others!
lenders.occupational_info: Providing assistance in an office and distributing information.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I am selfish, and giving has always filled my heart more than receiving.  I like having a full heart, so I give.  Besides, we're all family and brothers and sisters are supposed to help each other.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I suppose I'm in a position where I can. The community concept of KIVA just makes perfect sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in advertising, marketing and new media in the developing nation of Fiji.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: It helps people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate and want to share my blessings.

lenders.name: Gus
lenders.loan_because: I don't need an SUV, a boat, a five bedroom house, a giant flat panel tv, a summer cottage, a rolex watch or a designer pet. I have my dog, a roof and a good job. It's a nice feeling to be able to give a little back to help someone with a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: soul crushing.

lenders.name: Dvrenaissance Foundation
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can! We loan because of the help that Dvrenaissance Enterprises received when we were just starting. If we can help someones dreams come true with just a little bit of help, then we are more than happy to do our part. It's time to make a difference... It's time for dreams to come true!
lenders.occupational_info: The Dvrenaissance Foundation offers assistance (time, money, etc) to entrepreneurs who are trying to make a difference in the World.

lenders.name: Omar
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to realize her dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I develop web based computer systems.  It's a great job!

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: My advantages are an accident of birth- I am grateful for them and want to give a bit of that advantage to someone else in need of it.  The idea that I am separate from my fellow humans is an illusion that I wish to dispell.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand the law and try to make good choices for their workers.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: I may not have a lot of money, but I have more than many, many people in this world.  If I can afford to help, I want to.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach writing and American literature at a public university in North Texas.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: This is a unique opportunity to have a direct impact to help a family rise out of poverty.

lenders.name: hassan & andrea
lenders.loan_because: we can     =)

lenders.name: Gregg and Helen
lenders.loan_because: We loan because 100% of our money goes to those who  need "a hand up rather than a hand out."

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Jesus has blessed us so we may be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Matthew Kennedy
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping the less fortunate.  What goes around comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: Refreshing.

lenders.name: Bay Shore Model UN Club
lenders.loan_because: The best way to empower others is by helping them to provide for their families through the development of a sustainable work project.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a Model UN club that works to understand the issues currently facing our world. We also work to understand the perspectives of other countries around the world.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I am truly blessed everyday.  I have a job, a home, and a beautiful loving family.  If I can do anything to pass that along then I will have made some impact somwhere in someones life and the lives of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital.  Everyday is challenging and exciting.  Helping others is something that I like to do and welcome the opportunity to see others do the same.

lenders.name: Bakker Family
lenders.loan_because: Some people need a little more help than others, and if you have the means to help then you should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of 4 children, one of whom is special needs. I am lucky enough to be able to look after my children full time.

lenders.name: Sanzaru
lenders.loan_because: I understand the stresses of starting a business from nothing.
lenders.occupational_info: Make games for people to play on their wii, playstation, or xbox.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: this seems like a great way to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I determine the risks of businesses and find appropriate ways to handle the risk

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: it gives me joy.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach psychology and women's studies classes at a small college.

lenders.name: Trireka
lenders.loan_because: I loan because Imp a single parent and know what its like to need financial help as I am trying to start my own business as well. God said give and it shall be given. Besides it just feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working as an information technologist. I basically take calls from people needing help with their computers.

lenders.name: Arno
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Work with governments around the world resolving development issues.

lenders.name: Scott & Chérie
lenders.loan_because:
The world is more beautiful when we reach out to one another. 
No small kindness is ever wasted.
lenders.occupational_info: Scott locates earthquakes from volcanoes. Chérie is a wild mannered kindergarten teacher by day and children's book author in her "free time".

lenders.name: Eve
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that I can; we all should.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: Keas
lenders.loan_because: I believe that God wants to put the world back to rights and micro-loaning is one way I can join him in this
lenders.occupational_info: I am passionate about church planting and missions...i'm studying both right now so I can hopefully do a good job with them in the future

lenders.name: Eric Herboso
lenders.loan_because: ...it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my time considering various things, and attempting to come to conclusions about life's mysteries.

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is an excellent way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Bravo Family
lenders.loan_because:
A tiny loan can change somebody's life and those around him/her. 
I hope that rich governments (U.S.A, EUROPE, Japan, etc) can learn from us (people sponsoring KIVA).

lenders.name: Lynette
lenders.loan_because: I have a home, food and healthcare.  Millions do not.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I love having the opportunity to help people in need get a head start. You know what they say "Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, but teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime".

lenders.name: Leigh
lenders.loan_because:
Because it is an honor. 
Because I am grateful.
Because of the wonderful souls of those who made this opportunity possible for me.

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: Love makes the World go round. :-)

lenders.name: Laura & Yancey
lenders.occupation: small business owner and a registered nurse
lenders.loan_because: we own and operate our small businesses and know this can change lives for others who are willing to work hard for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: auto towing business and we own a bar. i am also a nurse and assist elderly clients. i am interested in the health care industry.

lenders.name: Jaimie
lenders.loan_because: I feel good about helping people succeed and empowering them in their independence.  I also don't have much that I can donate and this is the best way to maximize the impact of what litle I can give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of religious studies.  I basically read all the time.

lenders.name: Sasha
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all need help and support at some point - sometimes we're the helper, sometimes the helpee...

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Visible positive impact makes me from me enhances my life :)
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find homes that help them live their dreams

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy to give people a hand up to help them improve their lives, and it makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student completing a bachelor's degree.

lenders.name: Mattias Petter Johansson
lenders.loan_because: I'm not into charities, and admire entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Kati
lenders.occupational_info: Changing the way Finnish people see, live, think and use alcohol.

lenders.name: Mikko
lenders.loan_because: There is a great need for these small loans. It is better to loan money for buying a fishing rod than donate money to buy fish.
lenders.occupational_info: Academic teaching and researching about various aspects of human-computer interaction and making user interfaces better for non-technical users

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Empowering people to build their own lives is a privilege.

lenders.name: Kristy
lenders.whereabouts: The Entrance North New South Wales
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate and because I am compelled

lenders.name: Ann Christin + Andreas
lenders.loan_because: It is important.
lenders.occupational_info: We design and prepare books for publishing houses.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying to help themselves and their country's economy. I am so happy to be able to make small loans that can  change lives.

lenders.name: Inna
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone should have an opportunity to better their life.

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: that's the least I can do!

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because:
I'm opposed to charity, but I believe that those committed to improving their lives should be empowered to do so.  For what I might waste on a meal I can afford to loan someone money so that they might improve their lives.  I also look very favorably upon people creating businesses that employ others, because this activity not only supports the individuals' life, but helps support the community they live in as well.  I believe supporting entrepreneurship on a micro level is a great thing to do.

This is quite honestly one of the greatest ideas and implementation of an idea I've ever seen.  

(This is a brilliantly designed site)
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze a variety of data and situations and make suggestions on future courses of action.  I assess threats and suggest action to mitigate those threats.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a wonderful opportunity to help people get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a molecular biologist, currently studying bone and tooth development and regeneration.

lenders.name: Vasili
lenders.loan_because: Why not?  It's a great way to help people out, and if you really need your money back you can withdraw it later.  It's strange that people wouldn't do this.  Great Idea!

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I love to empower others to empower themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate the removal of what's blocking you energetically, mentally, spiritually, physically or emotionally so you can create the life you desire.

lenders.name: Harley
lenders.loan_because:
It's best that Mr. J not keep all this loot we get.

Vroom!
lenders.occupational_info: Beat up Batman.  Feed the babies.  Have to eat Jokerfish - ugh.  Still, it's a living!

lenders.name: Paul and Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: We hope to be helping someone have a better life for themselves and for their family.

lenders.name: Steven & Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We want to be role models for our children.  We want to teach them that giving is more rewarding then anything physical thing they can receive.  We want our children to 'see' that they are helping others in other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Steven has recently started his own business.  We strongly believe that empowering other entreprenuers to make their dreams a reality is as important as our own.  We are super lucky and know that giving back is very rewarding.

lenders.name: Kate, Jim, & Emma
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and want to help others have the resources to succeed.

lenders.name: Art & Doreen
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy being able to share with others.  Microbusiness loans are a perfect way to help many people.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to give someone a hand up!

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I feel like this is such a wonderful opportunity to help someone and see what is being done with the funds!

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: We were inspired by President Bill Clinton to help, this is an amazing program to aide others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: My Wife Darla and I are entrepreneurs in the safety business which is designed to safeguard against all hazards.

lenders.name: SOCIAL EDUCATION SUPPORT
lenders.loan_because: for durable sustainance and early child hood education
lenders.occupational_info: Happy to be part of the team that bring smile to peoples life

lenders.name: Vaclav
lenders.loan_because: If you treat an individual as if he were what he ought to be and could be, he will become what he ought to be and could be.   -- Goethe

lenders.name: Priscila Dias
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make a difference. It’s a great feeling to know my contributions are helping others. 

Keep up the good work! =)

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people who have the desire and drive to improve their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a lumber yard/ hardware store.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I would not have opportunity and an education if loans were not available to me. To give is to receive!
lenders.occupational_info: Social Science researcher, HIV and Drug Prevention, Program evaluator

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: Your site makes it easy to help in some small way others who are struggling to provide the necessities in life for their families.

lenders.name: heidi
lenders.loan_because: It is such an easy way to help someone less fortunate than myself. I  feel I get more than I give: I will finally get my money back and still I get the delight of helping someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm married and I have 2 children. I'm a  surgeon in an university hospital and visual artist.

lenders.name: Wiliam
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans are a great way to know your funds are working. The loans we make may be small but they make a measurable difference to the men and women who get them. A little push is all they need. Once they get their business off the ground, they can provide for themselves, their family, and even help others. But the best thing about this is knowing these folks have a real future.
lenders.occupational_info: I am disabled but own and operate an electrical contracting firm. My company has about 20 excellent employees. My team pitched in when I was injured (saving me an even worse disaster). I owe them a lot. I understand how people helping people benefits everyone.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: It's a small amount that can make a big difference to someone's future.

lenders.name: Sherida
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.  My small donation is not much of a sacrifice for me, but hopefully will help to make a positive difference in someone else's life.  We are all children of the same loving Heavenly parents who expect us to love and help one another when the opportunities are presented.  I am grateful for being able to have this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise a group of clerical/secretarial employees at a power plant.

lenders.name: Giving for Good
lenders.occupation: Nice Group of People who Want to Give

lenders.name: Bryan & Kim
lenders.loan_because: A problem we perceive with traditional banking is that it focuses on its own risk and return. The other benefits to access to credit (such as economic development and positive spillovers) are missed. We want to find someone who can really improve his or her well-being where our loan might actually make a difference. The opportunity cost we bear (by not getting interest and exposing myself to default risk) is minor in comparison.
lenders.occupational_info: Bryan teaches and does research in Economics at Wake Forest University. Kim is a homemaker.

lenders.name: michele
lenders.loan_because: i feel as if i am part of the solution and not part of the problem.   i have been helped so many times by total strangers that i wish to continue the goodness and well being that it generates.
lenders.occupational_info: i worked 28 yrs for the us postal service, sorting mail on several different types of machinery.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: If we don't take care of those in need, who will take care of us when we are in need?
lenders.occupational_info: I support the military-industrialist complex in the United States...so this is a way to compensate (kind of like buying carbon offsets so I can drive an SUV, huh?)

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: I have a heart for the poor because God does
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies use technology to improve their ability to service others

lenders.name: Z. Chen
lenders.loan_because: I can...

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: its something small I can do to help and yet, when combined with other people the effect can be great and affect a person's life in a positive way even if I don't know that person. I like the idea of assisting in the creation of hope.
lenders.occupational_info: My son tells people his mom travels for a living. Actually, I do travel quite a bit. I open and manage operations for my company throughout central american and the caribbean while handling the business we have in south america from my office in Florida. I'm lucky - I love the job and the people I work with! I try to focus my loans on the areas of the world where I have have operations.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps! I'm glad my small contribution can make someone else's life a little better.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: it's a very cool way to spread wealth around the world where needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired.

lenders.name: Jeff & Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: We should always share what we have!

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I want to be connected to people trying to climb out of poverty. I know that microfinance works.

lenders.name: Charmaine
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that this is a loan to help someone make a success of their business and not just a handout. I picked to give to women because I think women have to struggle harder to make it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently retired, having retired from two different careers, however I do still work from January through April 15th, doing taxes for people, I am entering my 5th year of doing this. i am 69 years old, married (37 years), with one grown child, a great daugtht-in-law, and a 3 year old granddaughter.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I Care

lenders.name: Marek
lenders.loan_because: I think that with a little bit of help, people can do miracles.

lenders.name: Terrence
lenders.loan_because: I can. $25 is a good piece of money to my family too, and so when I can afford it, I like to know that someone else's family is feeling a bit more comfort, that the world cares and isn't out to get them.
lenders.occupational_info: I make books by hand using age old tools and processes.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm an online content publisher. Sometimes I write articles on my own and other times I hire writers to cover specific topics and stories for me. Essentially "new media" projects. I hope I bring health and hope to those seeking loans for their business and other projects. Good luck to you all!

Feel free to visit my website on renewable energy which you can find below. I believe in sustainable living and renewable energy and micro loans are all a part of it in my vision. Spread the word of sustainability and helping out your fellow man!

lenders.name: felicity
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: The measure of your life will not be in what you accumulate, but in what you give away.
lenders.occupational_info: To someone in another country who's not familiar with a Realtor; I help families buy, & sell homes.

lenders.name: Manon
lenders.loan_because: There isn't an easier way to change the world in to a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: The focus of career coaching is generally on issues such as career exploration, career change and personal career development.

lenders.name: Lyndsey
lenders.loan_because: Our Father God wants us to love one another.  This is my way and it feels good!  I wish I could do more.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: “A small group of thoughtful people could change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.” - Margaret Mead
lenders.occupational_info: I endeavor to harness the talent of people in small communities and magnify their efforts locally and around the world.

lenders.name: Kolin
lenders.loan_because: if the situation were reversed I would appreciate the kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Ohio University.

lenders.name: Jose Antonio
lenders.loan_because: There isn't a better way to generate progress from a distance hundreds of miles away...

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: it's a step, albeit a very small one, in alleviating the inequity that impacts us all. lending does more than aid entrepreneurs in fulfilling their dreams; it provides necessary resources and services to communities. when needs are met, security follows.  i've been lucky to travel to some of the world's most beautiful and unique places, that are at the same time some of the most impoverished. this is my miniscule way of saying thank you…

lenders.name: jacki
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to that hope and dream for someone.  To be able to help them change their world and, in reality, their family's financial tree forever.

lenders.name: sage
lenders.loan_because: This was a birthday gift from a friend when I turned 10. This web site really gives me a chance to help other people who need this kind of money . It also shows me that I am very fortunate to be able to have the kind of things I have (which is a lot!).  Thankyou Mochi family!

lenders.name: Patti & Steve
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate and want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am able. If you can spare the initial $25, why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I help out teachers by assisting in lessons and setting up activities. I'm also a tutor.

lenders.name: Deepu and a bit of Artur
Joseph
lenders.loan_because: Because I support the entreprenual spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Passing wisdom and the means to succeed to the next generations.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I know the world is bigger than my own backyard.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate communities about healthy sexuality.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: love wins.
lenders.occupational_info: an artist building community in Eastern Europe.

lenders.name: Karil-SanFrancisco
lenders.loan_because: I know that poverty is the root cause of the most horrible human problems.  I want to help people, especially women, who are often the sole providers for their children, to escape poverty, to be able to care for their families, send their children to school, and as a result, build better lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce, direct, shoot and edit documentaries, most often on topics of health, environment, democracy and issues of special importance to women.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: it provides opportunity to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Spanish professor

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help local people and economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to ensure that banks computer systems are secure and operating efficiently.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: A way that I can help others without having to come up with a large sum of money.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is our duty to society as a whole to help those less fortunate than ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage construction projects for a small company in Denver, Colorado.

lenders.name: Satica Ranch
lenders.loan_because: "Giving frees us from the familiar territory of our own needs by opening our minds to the unexplained worlds occupied by the needs of others."  -Barbara Bush
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I operate a Cow-Calf Ranch

lenders.name: Kimberly Anne
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to help honest people in need. I was born in Medan, Indonesia and many of my family work as small store owners "tokos", pig farmers, sugar cane farmers and coffee farmers. Even though I live in the United States now, I still feel a connection to people with families, that work hard in agriculture and deserve a chance. I loan because I love to help and when I see the lenders succeed, it makes me feel happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a university as an admission counselor. Everyday I speak with prospective students from across the country and help them find the area of study that best suits their needs and help motivate my students to stay in college and complete their degrees. I love helping them all and when my students graduate, it makes me so happy and proud.

lenders.name: Marjory
lenders.loan_because: Because I feel that I have been blessed in my life and want to share that blessing with others.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: It is fun to imagine that I just might have a tiny impact on someone else. and then I will get to do it again when the loan is repaid. I am building a ladder of loans to payoff in different months.
lenders.occupational_info: financial planning and investments.

lenders.name: Gemma
lenders.loan_because: "How do you live in a better way?   The essential thing is to help others.  If more people are smiling, you get peace." -  the Dalai Lama -

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: they need...

lenders.name: shinstella
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: nadine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual to make a positive impact.
lenders.occupational_info:
Love those little guys in second and third grade.  Seven ,eight and nine year old children keep your feet on the ground, and running most of the time.
I started a new behavior plan with my art classes.  They can earn KIVA points for good behavior.  When they get 25 points, I will let them choose where in the world they want their KIVA money to go.  We are going to help artists all over the world with good behavior.  They are really excited.  So far third grade is ahead, but the second grade is not far behind!

lenders.name: Ryan Mercer
lenders.loan_because: What is a small amount to me, can make a drastic difference to others... why not help out?
lenders.occupational_info: I clear international freight so that it can come into the country by filing the appropriate paperwork.

lenders.name: Marla
lenders.loan_because: My children have made me a better person, they have so much - I want others to be able to provide for their children

lenders.name: GeorgiAnne
lenders.loan_because: Why not?  Making a positive difference in other's lives - can it get better than that?
lenders.occupational_info: I communicate to our internal partners when changes are occuring in any (of our many) computer systems.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I believe that our world is all interconnected, yet 98% of the world's wealth and resources are found within only 2% of the world's population.  It is time that the 2% shared some of those resources.  I loan because of my love for humanity and my belief in their resilience.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide psychotherapy for children, adolescents and adults in the Dallas/Fort Worth area.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with companies (TV, film, and groups and organizations) to get their video seen on the internet.

lenders.name: Debbi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who have not been as fortunate as most of us in the United States.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I know what it feels like to be a single woman building several businesses of my own. It is a large and exciting task!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the international freight business, a life coach, and I have a sales training business.

lenders.name: JoAnne
lenders.loan_because: It makes a huge difference in people's lives by giving them a chance to become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of property that people can rent so that they may have a place to live or work.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: I would like to give back to the people of Viet Nam.  The cost of their suffering, by the hands of U.S. military, 40 years ago, can never be repaid.  This is only the little part I can play in the repaying our debt.

lenders.name: Logan
lenders.loan_because: I know that there are so many people in the world that do not have the opportunities that we have.  I have picked this is a way to give back from my own lawn cutting money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am only thirteen years old but I do help maintain about 40 acres of lawn all summer.  I also make money raking, shoveling snow, however I can.  When I am older I hope to be a pilot or a fireman

lenders.name: Shefali
lenders.loan_because: Because its nice to do
lenders.occupational_info: I help sick people get better

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: This is the perfect program -  supporting entrepreneurs  but also being able to reinvest the money !
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer at the Plains Conservation Center and the Denver Dumb Friends league.

lenders.name: Bill & Marguerite
lenders.loan_because: We like to offer opportunities to others because we have been so blessed in what we have been able to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Was a nurse in a doctor's office, and account executive for a trade-show exhibit company. Now both retired.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I want to raise the global vibration.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: These loans really do change lives, often of whole families, and it's so easy to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Nearly 40 years in IT and banking. Kiva helps keep things in perspective during these difficult economic times.

lenders.name: Constantin
lenders.loan_because: There is so much we can help others for so little. A great way to make people  become independent rather than simply donating.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a programming consultant  with clients in LA, NY and Florida. Love to help others in need who want to make to get back on their feet...

lenders.name: Lefthand
lenders.occupational_info: "Then it was as if I suddenly saw the secret beauty of their hearts, the depth of their hearts where neither sin nor knowledge could reach, the core of reality, the person that each one is in the eyes of the divine.  If only they could see themselves as they really are, if only we could see each other that way all the time, there would be no more need for war, for hatred, for greed, for cruelty.  I suppose the big problem would be that we would fall down & worship each other."  (Tara Brach,  Radical Acceptance p272)

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I'm also an entrepreneur and understand how difficult it is to raise enough funds to start and maintain a business. It's a pleasure to be able to help others who want to be self-employed and provide a service.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a student in art school working toward a second bachelor's degree in animation (cartoon films).

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: To try to help out, as others have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair passenger aircraft making the planes safe to fly in.

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to do so

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is one of the best ways to help change the world
lenders.occupational_info: Through trends and research I help make sure that apartment complexes rent thier units at the best price in order to create a win/win situation for everyone.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.occupational_info: I help people stay healthy.

lenders.name: dch
lenders.loan_because: it is a small way to help others and remind oneself of how fortunate we truly are....
lenders.occupational_info: investing in and assisting new business ventures to grow into successful organizations

lenders.name: Graham & Flynn
lenders.loan_because: They need this money more than us.

lenders.name: emilio astier peña
lenders.loan_because: l feel good helping others....to live in this time and this planet and doing it a better place

lenders.name: Evan & Family
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company

lenders.name: jared
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see people have as much money as they can to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: great working with technology that i love so much

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of a concrete solution to the cycle of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep track of the financial transactions (money spent and received) for the business I work for.  I'm also studying to become an Accountant.

lenders.name: Kathi
lenders.occupation: wife, mother of 4 and a pediatric RN
lenders.loan_because: As a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, I believe that it is my duty to help others. We all need a helping hand up at some point in our lives and giving back is a way to honor those who helped me when I needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a  pediatric RN (nurse) and work with young children who have special health care needs.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: This is a very interesting concept that I would like to support.  I especially enjoy the thought of supporting women in business as I was a business woman myself a few years ago.  I owned a spa & boutique that used organic products & sold local art work & recycled clothing. I know it takes money to make money.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently working with the elderly as an occupational therapist in skilled nursing.  I'm also working in the community providing therapy to seniors who live in assisted living facilities.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact in other parts of the world, and micro finance is a great way to do just that. I also loan because I have been blessed with the opportunity and the means to help others who have not.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Wake Forest University, interested in International Development and will probably major in Political Science or History, and hopefully attend graduate school for International Studies.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I believe if you give what you need it will come back to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work very hard a being the best parent I can be.

lenders.name: Celina
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others in need and possibly make their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to children from Kindergarten to 5th Grade whose primary language is other than English.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I received a lot of private financial help that enabled me to graduate from college and I want to continue to pass on what was so generously given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a surgical nurse

lenders.name: Aleece
lenders.loan_because: people were very nice to me a long time ago, and I have never forgotten how much the small things mean.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a court reporter and realtime writer for closed captioning.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the micro-loan concept, and feel that everyone can make a difference in this world - no matter how small their donation is.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a government retirement system, and I make sure that retirees get their pensions properly and on time.

lenders.name: Kayleigh
lenders.loan_because: People are people, no matter where they're from, what they believe in, or their socio-economic backgrounds.

lenders.name: Mika
lenders.loan_because: I want her to have a sustainable life in happy with lots of smile!

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: because I can

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy or sell their personal home.

lenders.name: Meribeth
lenders.loan_because: It's Fun
lenders.occupational_info: Stay in School

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I loan money to hard-working, good people in third world countries to give others less fortunate than me a chance to live a better life with a slight helping hand. Then if they don't pay me back I fly out there to break their legs.  It's been 12 months, where's my $25???
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I drink beer. Lots and lots of beer. I dunno, I'm a pretty bad loan shark.  I never seem to make any money off this gig. I think I have to be less lazy and start charging interest. I've tried asking my late paying customers to travel to New York so I can break their legs, but they never listen to me.  I'm thinking about taking out a Kiva loan to buy some lead pipes and hire some overseas goons to get my business off the ground.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: dispersed economic prosperity will unify the world
lenders.occupational_info: social responsibility

lenders.name: Fatim
lenders.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed with health and comfort. We need to share that with others and help them achieve their goals in life.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and journalist

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: My daughter stephanie (4 years old) and I choose who we can help.  It is a great teaching tool for both of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with an Indian Tribe in the desert of the United States.  My job is to keep everyone safe while they are trying to work

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: It feels so much more meaningful and personal to lend money to an INDIVIDUAL rather than give money to a big charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired from the business world where I worked at an 'office job' in the area of Business Intelligence.  (I'm an American living in Sweden.)

lenders.name: Namaste Faustino
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to enjoy life more RIGHT NOW.

lenders.name: Ganapathy Family
lenders.loan_because: This is the least we can do.  Empowering people to work their way to a better life is more powerful than charity.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are happy parents of two wonderful children.  I took the easy job... working with computers.  My wife on the other hand makes us a family and provides us with a home.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: i feel that this is one of the only ways you can help a specific person and know that all of your money is going to that person, rather to in the pockets of governments.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a record label and promote our artists to the radio industry in the UK.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I really believe in empowering motivated entrepreneurs to be able to follow their dreams and achieve financial independence in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I create and manage programs that teach children and young adults how to set goals, manage their money and become financially independent.

lenders.name: Tran
lenders.loan_because: It s the best opportunity for everyone anywhere. Their can outdo extreme poor. And it s right oneself began to do rich in future,
lenders.occupational_info: All time I was worked by it still not enough to do my bussiness, but that defeated so not . I really admiring of this teams with help by money already everyone development on global. Thank you very much.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach people the best  way to exercise their body and encourage them to exercise weekly.

lenders.name: Yukino
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is a very valuable opportunity.Supporting someone is my pleasure. I realy appreciate my friend Leslie who told me about Kiva.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I have the money and i'm aware of just how easy life is in this country compared to the way people live in poorer countries. It's nice to be able to help people out, even if their complete strangers.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people when they're unhappy with the treatment they've recieved from the company i work for. Sometimes all they want is an apology, or an explanation, other times further action or a monetary gesture is required.

lenders.name: chiahui
lenders.loan_because:
I would like to give them
opportunities to become economically independent

lenders.name: Tara

lenders.occupational_info:
I am 35 years old ,Ihve 2 child one stady std 6 and other form 2 thus through my business anable me to be depandant
for school fees and basic need.

lenders.loan_because: I like helping people and the good feeling it gives me.

lenders.name: jennifer
lenders.loan_because: My students want to give opoortunities to those without them.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 150 students a day and I teach them government.

lenders.name: Graham
lenders.loan_because: I work throughout the world and am blessed by the good things life has bestowed upon me. I'm a low key kind of person and want to help others in my own way.

lenders.name: mandy
lenders.loan_because: Its good to share your good fortune

lenders.name: Sanchin
lenders.loan_because: May be I can do something little to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I am teaching at universities as a part-time lecturer on media study, and other social sciences fields.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of Microfinance!  I get great satisfaction out of helping others who are working hard to better themselves.  "And if you spend yourselves in behalf of the hungry and satisfy the needs of the oppressed, then your light will rise in the darkness, and your night will become like the noonday." - Isaiah 58:10

lenders.name: Campus Echo/NCCU
lenders.occupation: Student Journalists with the NCCU Campus Echo
lenders.loan_because: We first joined Kiva in 2007 while writing a news story about micro lending to inform NCCU's students about it. We incorporated our experience with making this loan into the news story. Now each year at our annual picnic we pass the hat and add a little more to our Kiva fund.
lenders.occupational_info: We are journalists in training at a historically black college, N.C. Central U., in Durham, North Carolina.

lenders.name: Rob O
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can make a real difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone whose life is more difficult than mine.
lenders.occupational_info: I take pictures of pets: mostly dogs, and people at work.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I think this a great way to help our fellow earthlings, thanks for the opportunity.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.  I think that I was lucky to be born in the US and to have opportunities to help othes.
lenders.occupational_info: I work marketing an engineering firm and writing proposals.

lenders.name: Christi
lenders.loan_because: i like thinking i am giving someone a hand up---sustainability
lenders.occupational_info: i help provide low income housing with Habitat for Humanity

lenders.loan_because: the amount of interest that our money earns in a regular savings account is insignificant when we look at how large of an affect that $25 or $50 can have on someone's life.

lenders.name: Jennyann
lenders.loan_because: it's the least I can do.

lenders.name: danielle kelly

lenders.name: Bethany

lenders.name: Vanessa

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because:

lenders.loan_because: I believe the most powerful way to improve living conditions in developing countries is through small businesses where people feel personally invested in the outcome.  Work is meaningful and empowering.

lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Preston
lenders.loan_because: I have seen firsthand the impact these loans can have on improving a family’s livelihood and wellbeing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a development consultant working on issues of trade and competitiveness, small business development, natural resource management, and poverty alleviation.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is a small thing that I can do to help someone else improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant for a large global business. My work consists of reporting and managing financial information for a division of that business.

lenders.name: AmberT
lenders.loan_because: Micro-Loans Rock!  I hand up, not a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: Translate for people who use different languages.

lenders.name: Tess
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Nicole, Austin and Devon
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.

lenders.name: Camaran
lenders.loan_because: I believe we, as individuals, have the power to affect positive social change if we work together.  To me, this is what microfinance does...it provides critical opportunities for individuals to empower themselves and change their lives for the better...

lenders.name: John and Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I feel gulty, or maybe blessed.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I can directly help people that are helping themselves.

lenders.name: Brandie
lenders.occupation: Co-Owner of various aviation related businesses
lenders.loan_because: ”To laugh often and love much; to win the respect of intelligent persons and the affection of children, to earn the approbation of honest critics; to appreciate beauty; to give of one's self, to leave the world a bit better, whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to have played and laughed with enthusiasm and sung with exultation; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived--that is to have succeeded.” --Ralph Waldo Emerson

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: i think it's a great idea

lenders.name: Tedie and Katy West
lenders.loan_because: God has given us mercy and grace and we should love our brothers as ourselves.

lenders.name: Zac and Jaime
lenders.loan_because: We would notbe where weare now without the generosity of others.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are dentists in San Carlos,California.

lenders.name: JTS
lenders.loan_because: Our family works directly with clients for two local charities.  Kiva allows us to expand our personal support to individuals around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves software systems.  I work to improve the quality and reduce the costs of developing and maintaining those systems.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: it's personal, and it connects me with the greater world in a very real way.
lenders.occupational_info: I write communications that help companies sell their products and services.

lenders.name: Paula Miritello
lenders.loan_because: I believe that when you help someone else it makes the world a much better place. It takes one act of kindness to change so much in the world. You afford someone else with the opportunity to achieve success!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being able to contribute, on a personal level, toward growing a small business.  Kiva's tangible approach to micro-lending is very gratifying.

lenders.name: Bridal Resources
lenders.loan_because: Life is good and it's time to share.
lenders.occupational_info: We're a directory of wedding vendors and services, primarily in the US and Canada. ♥ http://Facebook.com/BridalResources  ♥ http://Pinterest.com/BridalResources

lenders.name: Julian & Mercedes
lenders.loan_because: Even the hardest working, most creative individuals will need some money to make their plans happen.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife works as a Spanish Interpreter for a Hospital, and I fix and maintain telecommunication equipment for AT&T.

lenders.name: Kimberlie
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I are interested in helping individuals - not huge corporations.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a producer at a post production facility in Los Angeles.  Basically we edit commercials!
